mean_cn: n. 兵变，叛乱，暴动；  v. 反叛，暴动，参加叛乱
mean_en: a situation in which a group of people (such as sailors or soldiers) refuse to obey orders and try to take control away from the person who commands them
word_etyma: mutin反抗 + y名词后缀 → mutiny叛乱，兵变
sentence: The workers gathered in mutiny against their boss.
sentence_trans: 工人们聚众反抗他们的老板。
